title: Bandhan Bank raises its highest deposit rate to 8.05%
description: Bandhan Bank has updated its deposit rates, introducing a new one-year fixed deposit scheme at 8.05% and discontinuing the one-and-nine month scheme. Senior citizens will receive 8.55% for the one-year deposit. The bank also offers 8% for deposits from one year one day to one year nine months and a five-year tax saver deposit at 7%.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
